articles.author: Adrian Horton
articles.title: Singer-songwriter Bobby Caldwell dies aged 71 - The Guardian
articles.description: The soulful singer known for his 1978 hit What You Won’t Do for Love died after a long illness, according to a statement from his wife
articles.content:
Bobby Caldwell, the influential singer and songwriter behind such R&B hits as Open Your Eyes and What You Wont Do for Love, has died at the age of 71.
The singer had endured a long illness, acco… [+1648 chars]

articles.title: "Willow" Series Cancelled at Disney+ After Just One Season - Bloody Disgusting
articles.description: A new adventure began last year on Disney+ with the premiere of “Willow” in November, a TV series adaptation/expansion of Ron Howard‘s 1988 fantasy adventure film. Unfortunately, we’ve learned this afternoon that Disney+ has already cancelled “Willow.” In all…
